item.title: Quarterly Report II
item.description: 1/14/04 The searing Athenian sun and blue skies gave way to a much more tranquil autumn that carried the scents of earth softened by Mediterranean rain. The dry dust and high midday sun turned to gentle clouds and all the...

item.title: Quarterly Report I
item.description: In the past, I have allowed my own romantic ideals, derived primarily from art and literature, dictate my expectations when dreaming out a train window. Of course, the machinations of my mind formed a London of Dickensian fog and umbrellas...
